SIGN_UP_BENEFITS: Sign up now so that you can find your parcels, and help your neighbours find theirs!
GOT_A_PARCEL_PARA: Just select their name below and we'll notify them.

NO_PARCELS_FOR_YOU.heading: Nobody has any parcels for you at the moment.
NO_PARCELS_FOR_YOU.subheading: As soon as it turns up you'll see it here.

PARCEL_SUBMITTED_THANK_YOU: Thanks! We'll let your neighbour know you have their parcel
PARCEL_SUBMISSION_ERROR: Oops! Something has gone wrong. Sorry about that. Please try again.
